column4: I uninstalled Ubuntu as a second OS from my laptop. Then i deleted all files i could find regarding Ubuntu. Then i deleted the partition it was using and resized my hardrive so its all back to normal.
but i cant get rid of the startup screen?
it keepsasking if i want to run Vista or Ubuntu
i kow how to do it, but i can't tell ya! every1 will get mad at me.... he he he he e
